  HelloWorld.interface,

const HelloWorld = await ethers.getContractFactory("HelloWorld");
await hello.greet(); // "Hi Ignition!"
await hello.setGreeting("Hi Ignition!");
await hello.greet(); // should show "Hello World!"
const hello = await HelloWorld.attach("0x1234abc..."); // replace with your address
